title: Mac Muse
data: The Mac Muse is a Czech single-place paraglider that was designed by Peter Recek and produced by Mac Para Technology of Rožnov pod Radhoštěm. It remained in production in 2016 as the Muse 4.[1] The aircraft was designed as an intermediate glider and paramotoring wing.[1] The design has progressed through four generations of models, the Muse, Muse 2, 3 and 4, each improving on the last. The models are each named for their approximate wing area in square metres.[1] The manufacturer claims a glide ratio of 9:1 for the Muse 4.[2] Data from Bertrand[1] General characteristics Performance
